website_summaries.verdict: This simple, streamlined bag gets the job done for skis measuring up to 165 centimeters.
pros: Self-repairing nylon coil zipper keeps main compartment shut
Holds a single pair of skis up to 165 centimeters
Fully adjustable compression straps have a quick-release function for ease of packing and removing skis

customer_reviews.title: Fabric too thin - no protection
customer_reviews.text: The service was good and delivery was quick. The ski bag was a nice size for youth skis or skis for shorter people (I'm a 110 lbs 5'2 female), they fit my 150 skis JUST barely but I prefer that to carrying around an extra long bag that has to be folded over and gets in the way. I returned the bag because the fabric is way to thin for this purpose. It's like a windbreaker almost, it doesn't offer the skis and poles much protection at all. Zippers and straps looked good and well stitched. I returned for a canvas-type fabric and am quite happy with that.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda H.

customer_reviews.title: check size
customer_reviews.text: good product for the price. It is protective but not padded. However, be certain to measure your skis first. My skis measured shorter than the measurements stated on the item's link. However, they barely fit in the bag. Customer service was very courteous and responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Goodell

customer_reviews.title: My own mistake - i should have read the fine print. But I didn't realize there are multiple ...
customer_reviews.text: Watch out this bag is not that long. Make sure your skiis fit in it before you order. I had to SQUEEZE mine in. My own mistake - i should have read the fine print. But I didn't realize there are multiple sizes. Blonde moment.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy S

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: thin bag, no ski protection..last bag I had from Level-9 was padded but it only fit up to 130cm
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, 100% Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Great value, 100% satisfied with this bag. It was for my son and its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: cupflppr

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: would not recommend this product, spend a little extra and get the padded bags for your skis.
customer_reviews.author: Joel C

customer_reviews.title: OK, but short.
customer_reviews.text: It's a little short for normal-sized skis. I have to insert them one at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Joe S

customer_reviews.title: It’s durable and perfect for storing and moving skis from place to place
customer_reviews.text: This bag is really simple but fits my 163s perfectly. It’s durable and perfect for storing and moving skis from place to place.
customer_reviews.author: clorox jackson

customer_reviews.title: useful but not for an everyday use
customer_reviews.text: the only problem is that the material doesn't stand my skis' sharpened edges
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas Aguayo

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: worked great for a last minute ski trip! great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Keltz

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price but too short
customer_reviews.text: Product was decent quality for the price. Problem is the quality control. The bag was listed as 65" long but in reality was only 62".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not just for skis!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to carry some stabilizer poles for my outdoor canopy. I do a lot of art festivals in the summer and needed to contain my stabilizer poles. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: Mtlmstr

product_meta.title: High Sierra Single Ski Bag
feature_bullets: Main compartment with durable three-quarter length, self-repairing nylon-coil zipper holds a single pair of skis.
